item.description:
Learn how your diet, exposure and general health create various skin growths, blemishes, and more serious lesions. Find out what this tells you about your health and what you can do.

Dr. Tel-Oren, aka Dr. T is a sought after holistic scientist who educates medical professionals and the general public worldwide about functional medicine and disease prevention via truly natural lifestyle, dietary modifications and sustainability. He is a licensed European Medical Doctor, Licensed Nutritionist and is America Board Certified of Functional Medicine, Oxidative Medicine and of Chelation Therapy. He is the founder of several holistic non-profits in US, Asia, Israel and Nepal. Dr. T will share his science-based findings and will delight us with his humorous observations. Come and be inspired on your path to greater wellness

FREE brief evaluations of your skin after the program from 8:30-8:55pm. If you follow up with treatment on Saturday or Sunday, the proceeds go to a nonprofit supporting schools, clinics, and sustainable development in rural poverty-stricken Nepal.

WHEN: Friday, January 27, 6:30-8:00pm Q & A follows
WHERE: Sandwich Public Library, 142 Main St., Sandwich, MA 02563

FEE: $15 pre-registration, $20 Cash or checks only at the door please.

Registration: www.doctorTevents.com
Questions: Dorothy Torrey, Cape Cod Ecopolitan Coordinator, 508-888-6677 or dorothy@pathtovibranthealth.com.  Visit: www.PathToVibrantHealth.com to learn more.
item.name: Lecture: Dr. Tel-Oren: Aging Skin, Moles, Growths, Tags & Lesions - How develop?
